ygData.subject: Foxfingers
ygData.msgSnippet: The lone bot wandered around useing his dampner to hide him from the autoguns. He watched carefully wondering if he d run into any old friends. (Drillbit,

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

The lone bot wandered around useing his dampner to hide him from the autogu=
ns. He watched carefully wondering if he'd run into any "old friends." (Dri=
llbit, Kit Kat, Starscream and a few others met him back at the old pack ba=
se when he snuck in.) He used his wrist scanners to keep an eye on Predacon=
 activity. With all the doors blocked there was only one way to go. Useing =
his cutting torch he sliced a way into the circulation system. He reasoned =
that since they were under a pool of molten lava there would be cooling and=
 air pumps somewhere. If he could disable those he could force the fortress=
 to rise. Where to begin was the problem. He ran along the ducts until he c=
aught a breeze of cool air being sent through. "Yes" he thought trying to w=
ork through the system. Before he reached his destination he heard a creak.=
 With a loud crash the duct he'd been crawling through collapsed landing hi=
m  about thirty feet in front of Drillbit, Shivah, Kit Kat and (I think) St=
arscream.
